translation.en: BOTH: Come and play with us. Come and play.
BOY 1: Not gonna get me! BOY 2: You wish!
REPORTER 1: This morning's quake is causing major problems for commuters.
The 5.7-magnitude quake hit New York early this morning.
translation.ko: 규모 5.7의 지진이 오늘 새벽 뉴욕을 강타했습니다

translation.en: Yet another in a series of quakes that has rattled both coasts.
translation.ko: 동부와 서부 지역 모두 지진 피해가 속출하고 있습니다

translation.en: Tokyo was hit again. And with the Berlin quake last week--
translation.ko: 도쿄는 또 피해를 봤고 지난주에는 베를린에서도...

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Question is: What is causing all these earthquakes?
Christ, even ESPN's doing the quakes now.
REPORTER 3: But we still don't know what's causing them.
Hey. My folks sent me over to see...
-...if you guys are still alive. -We're fine, Timmy.
translation.ko: - 살아 계신지 확인하래요 - 우린 무사해, 티미

translation.en: -See you later? LAURIE: Say hi to your mom for me.
Don't forget, you have Dr. Hotchkiss after school.
translation.ko: 학교 끝나고 호치키스 박사님 만나는 거 잊지 마

translation.en: We're wasting money on all those shrinks.
translation.ko: 정신과 상담 계속 받아봤자 돈 낭비야

translation.en: BOY: Hey, did you get the books from my locker?
Come on, man, just give me my book.
-What's wrong, your meds stop working? TEACHER: Hey! Hey!
JAKE: Give me my book! -Get off me!
Hey. You need to go home and cool off.
HOTCHKISS: You've been, uh, quite busy, Jake.
This big tower in the clouds you keep dreaming about...
translation.ko: 계속 꿈에 나온다는 구름 속 탑 말이다

translation.en: ...you say these earthquakes we've been having have something to do with it.
translation.ko: 이 탑이 요즘 일어나는 지진과 관계가 있다고?

translation.en: They happen because the Tower is under attack.
translation.ko: 탑이 공격을 받으면 지진이 일어난다고 했지

translation.en: You know when you can't differentiate...
-...between dreams and reality-- -It's not a dream.
I always see the same thing.
The Tower, the Man in Black, the creepy guys with the fake skins.
translation.ko: 탑, 맨 인 블랙 가짜 피부 뒤집어쓴 사람들

translation.en: What if the Tower were destroyed?
When you lost your father, your world fell apart.
translation.ko: 아버지를 잃고 세상이 끝난 것 같았겠지

translation.en: You have these visions of impending hell on Earth...
...Jake, you're describing the night your father died.
translation.ko: 아버지가 돌아가시던 날 밤을 묘사하는 거잖니

translation.en: The power of your mind, that's what they want.
translation.ko: 네 마음이 가진 힘 놈들은 그걸 원해

translation.en: LON: --control, he's unstable. We need to take the offer.
translation.ko: 걘 정서가 불안해 이 기회를 잡아야 해

translation.en: -It's great treatment for no money. LAURIE: It's not about the money.
translation.ko: - 공짜로 좋은 치료 받게 - 돈이 문제가 아니야

translation.en: -I'll wait in your room. LON: There's nothing more...
translation.ko: - 네 방에서 기다릴게 - 더 해줄 게

translation.en: -...we can do for him now. LAURIE: Jesus, Lon!
Can you at least pretend like he's your own kid?
I'm sorry, baby, we.... We didn't hear you come in.
What the hell happened in school today?
translation.ko: 학교에서 대체 무슨 사고를 친 거냐?

translation.en: You promised me you're gonna stay out of trouble.
...the school's been approached by a clinic upstate.
translation.ko: 북부에 있는 병원에서 학교로 연락이 왔대

translation.en: Who are having a hard time.
It's supposed to be a great place.
It's science-based: Brain scans, sleep patterns.
translation.ko: 과학적인 치료를 한다지 뇌 스캔, 수면 분석 같은 거

translation.en: LAURIE: I think it could-- -Yeah, okay.

translation.ko: 정신과 의사만 더 많겠지 시간 낭비야

translation.en: You think I'm crazy too, don't you?
We need help. We both need help.
LAURIE: I love him so much...
...and I just can't stand to see him like this.
translation.ko: 지금 같은 모습 너무 보기 힘들어

translation.en: He was such a happy kid.
You have nothing to be afraid of, my friend.
You want to know what's on the other side?
Not while the Tower still stands.
translation.ko: 탑이 서 있는 한 진 게 아니다
네가 버티는 한은 진 게 아니다

translation.en: Don't let him get into your head.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not aim with my hand.
-He who aims with his hand-- -Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: - 손으로 겨누는 자 - 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I aim with my eye.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 손으로 쏘는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: -I shoot with my mind. WALTER: Gunslingers.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 총으로 죽이는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: It never works on you, does it, Roland?
translation.ko: 롤랜드 자네한텐 한 번도 먹힌 적이 없었지

translation.en: The power you have to resist my magics....
WOMAN: The Man in Black fled across the desert...
translation.ko: 맨 인 블랙은 사막을 가로질러 도망쳤고

translation.en: -Hey. -This guy, he's some kind of soldier.
translation.ko: - 안녕 - 이 사람, 군인 같은 건데

translation.en: And this house, look, it's got a U.S. mailbox.
translation.ko: 그리고 이 집, 미국 우체통이 있어

translation.en: -I think it's in New York. MAN: Timmy, it's 7 a.m.
translation.ko: - 뉴욕 시내인 거 같아 - 티미, 아침 7시다!

translation.en: Sorry, got to go. Talk to you later.
The people from the clinic are here.
I can't.... I can't go now.
You got to step up, Jake.
If you won't do it for yourself, then do it for your mom.
LAURIE: It's in other boys? JILL: It's common in adolescent boys.
translation.ko: - 다른 애들한테도 있어요? - 사춘기 남자애들에겐 흔하죠

translation.en: What exactly do they do at your clinic?
Jake, these guys have been working with the school for a long time.
translation.ko: 이분들은 너희 학교랑 오랫동안 협력해 오셨대

translation.en: No, that's okay, Laurie. We encourage questions.
He's just a healthy growing boy.
I can assure you that all our tests are done in a controlled...
translation.ko: 이건 보장해줄 수 있어 실험은 편안한 환경에서

translation.en: We have experience with cases like yours.
translation.ko: 너 같은 경우도 많이 치료해 봤어

translation.en: Our approach is actually very gentle compared to standard treatments.
translation.ko: 일반 병원보다 훨씬 부드러운 방식이라고 할 수 있지

translation.en: I understand your concerns, but you don't have to worry at all.
translation.ko: 네 우려는 이해하지만 전혀 걱정할 필요 없어

translation.en: Do you want your ripped jeans or your regular ones?
translation.ko: 찢어진 청바지랑 그냥 청바지 중 뭐 가져갈래?

translation.en: -What? -It's the skin people from my dream.
translation.ko: - 뭐? - 꿈에서 본 가짜 피부 인간

translation.en: -Honey, you need to stop this. -No, you have to listen to me.
translation.ko: - 제발 그만해 - 아니야, 내 말 좀 들어봐

translation.en: You actually hope I'm crazy, just so you can get me out of here.
translation.ko: 아저씬 내가 진짜 미쳐서 이 집에서 나갔으면 좋겠죠?

translation.en: Mom, you have to believe me.
-Lon, maybe this-- -Can't you see he's gotten worse?
translation.ko: - 론, 아무래도... - 애가 더 나빠진 거 안 보여?

translation.en: You're gonna go with them right now.
translation.ko: 당장 저 사람들 따라가는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: Or, I swear to God, I will drag you down the stairs myself.
If you don't like it, then I'll come get you.
-I love you, Mom. -I love you too.
I'm just gonna get my toothbrush.
-He's just getting his things. -He's trying to escape.
translation.ko: - 괜찮아요, 짐 챙기는 거예요 - 도망치려는 겁니다

translation.en: TOBY: Come back here! JILL: Don't worry.
Toby will get him down safely.
-Mom? You okay? LAURIE: Where are you?
You can't just run away like that, Jake.
Find yourself a face, Rat Boy.
Fine. Do we have any new leads?
PIMLI: These are all showing promise.
Our trackers are going out to them as we speak.
TIRANA: There's been a serious breach of--
One of the old portals on Keystone Earth.
Find me a portal close by.
Choose a pretty face and the world is your oyster.
translation.ko: 예쁜 얼굴을 하고 있으면 세상에 안 될 일이 없지

translation.en: There are no Gunslingers. Not anymore.
-But I saw you. -Your dreams deceived you, boy.
translation.ko: - 하지만 아저씨를 봤어요 - 꿈이 널 기만한 거야

translation.en: Told you what you want to hear.
translation.ko: 네가 듣고 싶은 이야기만 해준 거지

translation.en: I came a long way to find you.
ROLAND: Have a nice trip back.
There was a battlefield, and you were fighting the Man in Black. And there--

translation.ko: - 안 돼, 안 돼 - 그를 아나?

translation.en: -No, no, no. I don't know! -Where is he hiding?!
-Where is he hiding?! -I don't know, I swear!
I just-- I just saw him in my dreams, like I saw you!
translation.ko: 그 사람도 아저씨처럼 꿈에서 본 거예요

translation.en: When did you first see this?
In all your visions, Walter is here?
There's a tribe beyond that forest. We'll go there.
translation.ko: 저 숲 건너에 사는 부족에게 간다

translation.en: They have seers who will read your visions.
translation.ko: 그곳에 네 꿈을 해석해 줄 예지자들이 있어

translation.en: Then I got water up my nose, and I went down...
Walter Padick. To what do we owe this great honor?
translation.ko: 월터 패딕 님 여기까지 오시다니 영광입니다

translation.en: Someone used a portal here, in your city...
We'll find out who this trespasser is and where he went.
So that's how he got through.
...but a truly powerful psychic could override it.
A boy with the Shine strong enough to kill a demon?
translation.ko: 악마를 죽일 정도의 샤이닝을 가진 소년이라면...

translation.en: Sayre, didn't two skins have trouble with a kid yesterday?
translation.ko: 세이어, 어제 가짜 피부 둘이 어떤 소년에게 당했잖아요?

translation.en: Don't want to have to carry you for the rest of the way.
translation.ko: 널 업고 목적지까지 갈 생각은 없어

translation.en: Don't run off in the woods. It's not safe.
But you were the one who ran off.
These ancient structures are from before the world moved on.
translation.ko: 세상이 나아가기 전에 있던 고대 조형물이다

translation.en: No one knows what they are.
There was a field covered with bodies.
I lost my father that day.
It's an honor to meet you in person, sir.
Well, I hear you lost a kid.
It was as if the child knew what we were. We're doing everything we can--
translation.ko: 꼭 저희 정체를 아는 것 같았습니다 지금 총력을 다해...

translation.en: Calm down. Enjoy the show, folks.
You draw with a good hand.
I don't know what this is.
My father showed me a.... A map like this once.
translation.ko: 아버지께서 이런 지도를 보여주신 적이 있지

translation.en: Inside the circle is your world and my world...
translation.ko: 원 안에는 너의 세계 그리고 나의 세계

translation.en: The Dark Tower stands at the center of all things.
translation.ko: 이 모든 세계의 중심에 다크타워가 서 있다

translation.en: And it's stood there from the beginning of time.
And it sends out powerful energy...
...full of demons trying to get to us.
Walter wants to tear down the Tower and let them in.
translation.ko: 월터는 탑을 무너뜨려 악마들을 들여오려 한다

translation.en: When the Tower falls, he'll rule...
But you're trying to stop him, aren't you?
translation.ko: 하지만 당신이 그를 막으려고 하잖아요, 그렇죠?

translation.en: I've seen them try to destroy it.
translation.ko: 그자가 탑을 무너뜨리려고 하는 걸 봤어요

translation.en: -If we could just get there-- -There is no "we," Jake.
All that matters to me is that I find...
They're just like the quakes we get back home.
Yeah, what happens in one world...
Everyone who walks with you dies.
It's good to see you, man. You got tall.

translation.ko: 저건 네가 아는 그 누구도 아니었다

translation.en: That was just a small tear.
They happen after every attack on the Tower.
Those things, they're what's coming if the Tower falls, aren't they?
translation.ko: 탑이 무너지면 저런 것들이 몰려오는 거죠?

translation.en: But if we find that place where they're keeping the kids, we could--

translation.ko: 애들을 잡아두는 장소를 찾아내기만 하면... 왜요?

translation.en: That was brave, going for the gun.
LON: They're gonna find him, Laurie.
translation.ko: 제이크는 곧 찾게 될 거야, 로리

translation.en: We filled out every form. They have his picture.
I hope you don't mind me making myself at home.
Where I come from, we don't have chicken.
-Who the hell are you? -Oh, you know me, Lon.
translation.ko: - 당신 대체 누구야? - 날 알잖아, 론

translation.en: You're the one that called me here.
translation.ko: 여기로 나를 부른 게 바로 너야

translation.en: ...but with your every desire to get rid of the brat...
...all in the hopes that Mommy there might love you best.
translation.ko: 엄마의 마음을 독차지하겠다는 욕망이 날 인도했지

translation.en: But you'll always be a seat-filler, Lon.
translation.ko: 그래 봐야 넌 영원히 대타일 뿐이야

translation.en: -You get out of here right now. -Lon.
It's the man from Jake's drawings.
Well, it looks like I've got myself a stalker.
This son of yours is quite special, isn't he?
And you sent your only child off to the asylum.
May you have twice that number.
I haven't seen one of your kind since I was a young man.
translation.ko: 젊었을 때 이후로 그대의 종족은 처음이군

translation.en: The boy here has visions of this place.
I need to know where it is.
PIMLI: We managed to do some serious damage, sir...
-...but it didn't fall. WALTER: None of that matters.
I found the one. This kid's going to bring down the Tower...
translation.ko: - 무너뜨리진 못했습니다 - 상관없다, 적임자를 찾았으니 그 아이 홀로 탑을 무너뜨릴 것이다
그 아이 홀로 탑을 무너뜨릴 것이다

translation.en: ...looking for an old friend of mine, Roland of Eld.
translation.ko: 내 오랜 친구를 찾아 왔지 엘드 가의 롤랜드

translation.en: Wait, I thought all the Gunslingers were dead.
WALTER: Roland's always had an annoying ability...
So I killed everyone he ever cared about.
translation.ko: 그래서 그자가 사랑했던 이들을 다 죽여버렸지

translation.en: Last I heard, he was roaming the Mohaine aimlessly.
-That's where the boy is going. -Mohaine Desert? Isn't that--?
Vast. Yes. And so is this boy's Shine.
translation.ko: 안다, 거대하지 그 애의 샤이닝 능력도 그렇고

translation.en: I'll send our trackers in the region, sir.
I don't have anything that can help with that.
You need to rest, let it heal.
You've come all the way from Keystone Earth to find him.
translation.ko: 그를 찾아 키스톤 지구에서 여기까지 왔구나

translation.en: His Shine is beyond anything I've ever seen.
translation.ko: 이런 샤이닝은 이제껏 본 적 없어요

translation.en: Very few are born with this gift.
Often, the power is so slight, people don't even know they have it.
translation.ko: 보통은 능력이 너무 약해서 지니고 있는지도 모른단다

translation.en: ARRA [THINKING]: Your Shine burns so brightly, Jake.
You have potential I can't even begin to understand.
translation.ko: 감히 상상도 못 할 잠재력이 있어

translation.en: Her voice was in my head.
It made you see across worlds.
translation.ko: 덕분에 다른 세상을 볼 수 있었던 거야

translation.en: That's more than six months of travel.
But you can get me there faster than that.
translation.ko: 더 빨리 가게 해줄 수 있잖소

translation.en: The Man in Black and his men keep track of all portal travel.
translation.ko: 포털을 통하면 맨 인 블랙 일당들이 알아챌 거예요

translation.en: We couldn't help you, even if we wanted to.
The only way to access their territories is from one of their own bases.
translation.ko: 그자들의 기지를 통해서만 그들의 영토로 갈 수 있어요

translation.en: Then I'll make it on foot.
...they take kids from different worlds, right?
They tried to take me from New York.
-Doesn't that mean that they--? -They have a base there.
With a portal that can take me right to this place.
translation.ko: 이곳으로 날 곧장 데려다줄 포털도 있겠지

translation.en: You're gonna send us to Keystone Earth.
CANTAB: We're diverting power to the generators.
The portal will be ready shortly.
Do they have guns in your world?
And bullets, are they as rare as they are here?
You're gonna like Earth. A lot.
We agreed we'd never use the portal unless the village was in danger.
translation.ko: 포털은 쓰지 않기로 했잖아요 마을이 위험할 때가 아니면요

translation.en: They will find out we have it and come.
translation.ko: 여기 포털이 있는 걸 알면 놈들이 올 겁니다

translation.en: We can't disobey a Gunslinger. It's the law.
translation.ko: 건슬링어를 거역해선 안 되네 그게 법이야

translation.en: -How do you know what he is? -Arra.
Last of the line of Eld.
But the Man in Black has his soul in his pocket...
translation.ko: 하나 맨 인 블랙에게 완전히 장악당해

translation.en: Or would you tell us differently?
Only a goat would lie to a seer.
The Gunslingers have sworn an oath to defend the Tower--
The war is over, and we lost.
If you left your little haven, you would see that for yourself.
translation.ko: 이 작은 피난처만 벗어나도 바로 알 수 있을게요

translation.en: ...and trying to fight against it accomplishes nothing.
I was fighting to defend the Tower before most of you were even born.
translation.ko: 당신들 대부분이 태어나기도 전에 난 탑을 지키려고 싸웠소

translation.en: As long as the darkness is out there, the Tower will fall.
translation.ko: 어둠이 존재하는 한 탑은 결국 무너질 거요

translation.en: And before that happens, I will get my revenge.
And he doesn't even like me that much.
CANTAB: Should be ready anytime now.
As soon as it aligns, it should open...
...in an unobstructed area in your city...
translation.ko: 너희 도시의 방해물이 없는 지역에서 열릴 거다

translation.en: Remember that number. It's your way back here.
translation.ko: 이 숫자를 기억하렴 다시 돌아올 때 필요해

translation.en: PIMLI: Sir, they're in the village.
-Can you fix it? -We have spare parts in the village.
translation.ko: - 고칠 수 있나? - 마을에 부품이 있습니다

translation.en: Jake, go find somewhere close to hide, understand?
-We need to go! Hurry! -Are you okay?
His guns are forged from the steel...
translation.ko: 저자의 총은 아서 엘드의 검에서 나온

translation.en: ...of the sword of Arthur Eld himself.
I believe Keystoners call it Excalibur.
-We have to get out of here. -No, I've got to get them out!
translation.ko: - 여기 있으면 안 돼 - 쟤들부터 보내야 해!

translation.en: No, no, please, we have to go!
WOMAN: They were after our boy.
Why would they want our boy?
-Turn on the water pumps. MAN: Right away, sir.
WOMAN: No! MAN 1: Let's try to get them out!
MAN 2: Okay, I'll take care of you! MAN 3: All right.

translation.ko: - 그 애를 잡으러 온 거예요 - 알고 있소

translation.en: JAKE: Roland. Please. Help me, please.
And as long as he's here, you aren't either.
translation.ko: 얘가 여기 있는 한 당신들에게도 위험해요

translation.en: Be careful using the Shine. They're tracking you.
translation.ko: 샤이닝 쓸 때 조심해 추적당할 거야

translation.en: We need to get you help. Right now.
One last time around the wheel, old friend.
You can't walk into a hospital here carrying guns.
translation.ko: 여기선 총 들고는 병원에 못 들어가요

translation.en: Let me do all the talking.
LAURIE [ON RECORDING]: Hi. You've reached Laurie, Lon and Jake.
...and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
RACCOON 1 [ON TV]: This is awful. Try it.
-That looks gross. What is it? -You got to try it. It's terrible.
-I don't want to try it if it's terrible. -It's like mango....
Do the animals here still speak?
Wait, what do you mean by "still"?
I see the antibiotics are kicking in.
On a scale of one to 10, how bad is your pain?
You were in very bad shape.
I'm surprised you're even sitting up.
We get that sentiment a lot.
So aside from your infection and the wound from the...
...we also found traces of hepatitis A, B, E, and...
translation.ko: 그 외에도 A, B, E형 간염 증세와

translation.en: Have you traveled overseas in the past couple of months?
translation.ko: 최근 몇 달 사이 해외에 다녀오셨나요?

translation.en: No. I've been here on Keystone Earth.
So am I cured or not?
We're going to keep you here for the night to monitor your progress.
Maybe tomorrow afternoon-- What are you doing? No.
-I can't stay here. DOCTOR: You need to get back on that.
translation.ko: - 여기 있을 수 없습니다 - 다시 맞으셔야 해요

translation.en: But you need to get back on that.
JAKE: These are painkillers and vitamins.
You only want to take one or two at a...
You have both forgotten the faces of your fathers.
translation.ko: 너희 둘 다 아비의 얼굴을 잊었구나

translation.en: You probably shouldn't talk to people here.
translation.ko: 여기 사람들과 말 안 하는 게 좋겠어요

translation.en: How we gonna find the portal? New York's a pretty big place.
translation.ko: 포털은 어떻게 찾죠? 뉴욕은 꽤 큰데

translation.en: I just can't let Walter know how I'm coming for him.
translation.ko: 다만 내가 어떻게 월터를 잡을지 그가 알아선 안 된다

translation.en: I haven't felt this good in years.
Yeah, we got the good stuff.
ROLAND: Got any more of that sugar?
ARRA: There's nothing to be scared of.
-You'll be-- WALTER: A seer who lies.
Don't fight it. Where did he take the boy?
You said they were crossing over kids.
You were one of them, weren't you?
Which way did they take you through?
-No, no, you have to run. -Do you remember? A portal, a door.
translation.ko: - 아니, 아니야, 도망가 - 기억해요? 포털 같은 거

translation.en: It's almost over. It's almost over.
Should have enough to find it. Got to get home and do some research.
translation.ko: 정보는 충분하니 집에 가서 검색해 봐요

translation.en: -Your home? -Yeah, I got to let my mom know I'm okay.
SAYRE: We have trackers spread throughout the city.
There's no trace of him yet, sir.
Couple of small spikes, but not enough to hone in on.
translation.ko: 위치를 파악할 만큼 충분한 정보는 없습니다

translation.en: I left a surprise for our little friend. Just be ready.
translation.ko: 꼬마에게 깜짝 선물을 남겼지 준비나 해두라고

translation.en: -You should probably wait here. TIMMY: Dude.
-Where the hell have you been? JAKE: Timmy. Um....
How's Mom and Lon? They must be freaking out.
They haven't been home since yesterday.
Close your mind. Let the pain run through you, Jake.
translation.ko: 어서 마음을 닫아 고통은 흘려보내, 제이크

translation.en: My mom died so you could have your revenge?
translation.ko: 엄마가 아저씨 복수를 위해 죽은 줄 아세요?

translation.en: Maybe your world is almost gone, but mine isn't.
translation.ko: 아저씨 세상은 끝났을지 몰라도 우리 세상은 아니에요

translation.en: You said it yourself, as long as the darkness is out there...
It calms the heart and the mind.
I haven't spoken it for years.
I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 손으로 겨누는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 손으로 쏘는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: I do not kill with my gun.
BOTH [IN UNISON] He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 총으로 죽이는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: STEVEN: Not while the Tower still stands.
translation.ko: 탑이 서 있는 한 진 게 아니다
네가 버티는 한은 진 게 아니다

translation.en: -I kill with my heart. -I kill with my heart.
translation.ko: - 나는 심장으로 죽인다 - 나는 심장으로 죽인다

translation.en: Your Shine is your weapon, Jake.
Just do what he says. He won't hurt you.
Well, then you're smarter than most.
All right, let's get you somewhere safe.
I see you finally found a compass, yet you still came to me.
translation.ko: 길을 인도해줄 아이를 찾고도 나에게 오다니

translation.en: Because I'm your only destination, Roland.
It's not me. I'm not doing this.
First, you want to save the Tower.
Then, kill the Man in Black.
translation.ko: 이젠 맨 인 블랙을 죽이고 싶으시다

translation.en: You are like a dog fetching a stick over and over.
You tell the kid what happened to the old crew?
You tell him that everyone that walks with you dies by my hand?
translation.ko: 자네와 함께한 자들 모두 내 손에 죽는다는 거?

translation.en: Your whimpering excuse for a dad.
Stop hiding behind your magic and face me, Walter!
translation.ko: 술수 그만 부리고 맞서 싸우자, 월터!

translation.en: We both know that no matter who crosses the finish line first...

translation.ko: 우주는 결국엔 사라진단 걸 우린 알잖나

translation.en: You are the full package, as advertised.
Tall, dark and handsome is about to crash the party.
translation.ko: 훤칠한 구릿빛 매력남께서 곧 쳐들어오실 테니

translation.en: MAN: Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Alrighty. Let's go put everyone out of their misery, shall we?
-It's really gonna happen, isn't it? -Oh, yes, it is.
Something's wrong here. The levels are plateauing.
Your visions didn't bring you to him, they brought you to me.
translation.ko: 넌 그놈이 아니라 내게 오려고 환영을 본 거야

translation.en: He doesn't love you. He doesn't care for you.
In fact, he's been using you this entire time to get to me.
This is why you're here. This is your destiny.
translation.ko: 이게 네가 여기 온 이유고 이게 네 운명이다

translation.en: Yes, that's it. There we go.
Oh, my God. It's the kid.
It's the kid! He's keeping the portal open!
So you wanted me to face you, old friend?
It's fitting that you and the Tower should fall together.
I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.ko: 손으로 겨누는 자 아비의 얼굴을 잊은 자라

translation.en: JAKE: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand--
Has forgotten the face of his father.
JAKE: I shoot with my mind.
JAKE: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun--
JAKE: Has forgotten the face of his father.
--has forgotten the face of his father.
FATHER: Oh, I'm so glad you're here.
REPORTER 1 [OVER RADIO]: Multiple witnesses saw... ...the strange phenomena in the sky.
translation.ko: 상공의 기이 현상 목격자들이 속출하고 있습니다

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Looks like we've seen the worst of it....
REPORTER 3: The weather center has now issued a statement...
...that it may have been some kind of very intense solar flare.
JAKE: Here. ROLAND: What is this?
I have to leave here, Jake.
Why don't you come with me?
Besides, I could use your help.
